attributes.action: Abolish all MP's Authority for decision making, that benefits themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why Should MP's have the authority to make decisions for their own benefit  when they work for us?
If they own a house or two, pay for it from their own pocket not ours,
if they want a wage rise ask the people who pay them. (yes you & me)
"My point is"
If you work for BT ask them for a £300,000 wage rise, because you are buying another house in switzerland and you spent £20,000 on dining and entertaining this year, will you get it? 
PM's moto "all for one and all for us"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
